content: Savings Lifestyle Bank Account Asked by AnonymousAsked on 07 Feb 2019What should I do if I can't login to Seedly app after updates?I have got an account on the seedly app for my track expenses using my email address but after updating the app, I am unable to login again. It quote that I have already had an account with my email address.Should I use another email address to login. I think it's quite a hassle to open another email account just for this.1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Tee-Ming Chew, Co-founder at SeedlyLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 07 Feb 2019Thanks for your question.To better assist your issue, could you drop an email via support@seedly.sg so that the support team can investigate with your Seedly account details? Appreciate it!0 comments2
